<noinclude>

This is the '''Csp formfield/checkbox''' template. It should be called in the following format:

<pre>
{{Csp formfield/checkbox 
|name= (text) 
|required= (optional: "required")
|value= (text)
|allowedValues = (optional: "Checked value, unchecked value") e.g. "true,false". Defaults to checked value "Yes" and unchecked value empty
}}
</pre>

== Example ==
<form action="get">
{{Csp formfield/checkbox
|name=Default allowed values
|value=Test checked
}}
{{Csp formfield/checkbox
|name=True-false
|value=Test checked
|allowedValues=true,false
}}
{{Csp formfield/checkbox
|name=True
|value=Test checked
|allowedValues=true,false
}}
<input type="submit"/>
</form>

}}


</noinclude><includeonly><!--
// hidden field for unchecked default value
--><input type="hidden" 
name="{{{name|}}}" 
value="{{#explode:{{{allowedValues|}}}|,|1}}"
/><!--
// checkbox with label
--><label><input type="checkbox" 
id="checkbox-{{lc:{{anchorencode:{{{name|}}} }} }}"
name="{{{name|}}}" 
value="{{#if:{{{allowedValues|}}}|{{#explode:{{{allowedValues|}}}|,|0}}|Yes}}"
checked="{{#ifeq:{{#if:{{{allowedValues|}}}|{{#explode:{{{allowedValues|}}}|,|0}}|Yes}}
|{{{value|}}}
|checked
}}"
required="{{{required|}}}"
/>{{#if:{{{allowedValues|}}}|{{#explode:{{{allowedValues|}}}|,|0}}|Yes}}</label></includeonly>
